chart.name: Number of Scale Sets
chart.programText: A = data('Percentage CPU', filter=filter('resource_type', 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachineScaleSets') and filter('primary_aggregation_type', 'true'), extrapolation='last_value', maxExtrapolations=5).count().publish(label='A')

chart.name: CPU %
chart.programText: A = data('Percentage CPU', filter=filter('primary_aggregation_type', 'true'), extrapolation='last_value', maxExtrapolations=5).mean(by=['azure_resource_name']).publish(label='A')

chart.name: Disk IOPs
chart.programText:
A = data('Disk Read Operations/Sec', filter=filter('aggregation_type', 'average'), extrapolation='last_value', maxExtrapolations=5).publish(label='A')
B = data('Disk Write Operations/Sec', filter=filter('aggregation_type', 'average'), extrapolation='last_value', maxExtrapolations=5).publish(label='B')

chart.name: Top Scale Sets by Bytes In
chart.programText: A = data('Network In', filter=filter('resource_type', 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachineScaleSets') and filter('primary_aggregation_type', 'true'), extrapolation='last_value', maxExtrapolations=5).mean(by=['azure_resource_id', 'azure_resource_name']).top(count=5).publish(label='A')

chart.name: Top Scale Sets by CPU%
chart.programText: A = data('Percentage CPU', filter=filter('primary_aggregation_type', 'true'), extrapolation='last_value', maxExtrapolations=5).mean(by=['azure_resource_id', 'azure_resource_name']).top(count=5).publish(label='A')

chart.name: Total Network Bytes Out
chart.programText:
A = data('Network Out', filter=filter('resource_type', 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachineScaleSets') and filter('primary_aggregation_type', 'true'), extrapolation='last_value', maxExtrapolations=5).publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = (A).min().publish(label='B')
C = (A).percentile(pct=10).publish(label='C')
D = (A).percentile(pct=50).publish(label='D')
E = (A).percentile(pct=90).publish(label='E')
F = (A).max().publish(label='F')

chart.description: Total number of credits consumed by the Virtual Machine. Applicable to burstable vms.
chart.name: CPU Credits Consumed
chart.programText: A = data('CPU Credits Consumed', filter=filter('primary_aggregation_type', 'true'), extrapolation='last_value', maxExtrapolations=5).publish(label='A')

chart.name: Network Bytes In vs. 24h Change %
chart.programText:
A = data('Network In', filter=filter('resource_type', 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachineScaleSets') and filter('primary_aggregation_type', 'true'), extrapolation='last_value', maxExtrapolations=5).sum().publish(label='A')
B = (A).mean().publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = (B).timeshift('1d').publish(label='C', enable=False)
D = (B/C -1).scale(100).publish(label='D')

chart.name: Network Bytes In vs 24hr Change %
chart.programText:
A = data('Network In', filter=filter('resource_type', 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines') and filter('primary_aggregation_type', 'true'), rollup='average').mean(by=['azure_resource_id', 'azure_resource_name']).publish(label='A')
B = (A).mean().publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = (B).timeshift('1d').publish(label='C', enable=False)
D = (B/C-1).scale(100).publish(label='D')

chart.name: Total Network Bytes In
chart.programText:
A = data('Network In', filter=filter('resource_type', 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachineScaleSets') and filter('primary_aggregation_type', 'true'), extrapolation='last_value', maxExtrapolations=5).publish(label='A', enable=False)
C = (A).min().publish(label='C')
D = (A).percentile(pct=10).publish(label='D')
E = (A).percentile(pct=50).publish(label='E')
F = (A).percentile(pct=90).publish(label='F')
G = (A).max().publish(label='G')

chart.description: Total number of credits available to burst. Applicable to burstable vms.
chart.name: CPU Credits Remaining
chart.programText: A = data('CPU Credits Remaining', filter=filter('primary_aggregation_type', 'true'), extrapolation='last_value', maxExtrapolations=5).publish(label='A')

chart.name: Active Scale Sets by Region
chart.programText: A = data('Percentage CPU', filter=filter('resource_type', 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines') and filter('primary_aggregation_type', 'true'), extrapolation='last_value', maxExtrapolations=5).mean(by=['azure_resource_id', 'azure_resource_name']).count(by=['azure_region']).publish(label='A')

chart.name: Disk Ops/Min
chart.programText:
A = data('Disk Read Operations/Sec', filter=filter('resource_type', 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachineScaleSets') and filter('primary_aggregation_type', 'true'), extrapolation='last_value', maxExtrapolations=5).sum().scale(60).publish(label='A')
B = data('Disk Write Operations/Sec', filter=filter('resource_type', 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachineScaleSets') and filter('primary_aggregation_type', 'true'), extrapolation='last_value', maxExtrapolations=5).sum().scale(60).publish(label='B')

chart.name: CPU % Trend
chart.programText: A = data('Percentage CPU', filter=filter('primary_aggregation_type', 'true'), extrapolation='last_value', maxExtrapolations=5).publish(label='A')

chart.name: Disk I/O
chart.programText:
A = data('Disk Read Operations/Sec', filter=filter('primary_aggregation_type', 'true'), extrapolation='last_value', maxExtrapolations=5).mean(by=['sf_metric']).publish(label='A')
B = data('Disk Write Operations/Sec', filter=filter('primary_aggregation_type', 'true'), extrapolation='last_value', maxExtrapolations=5).mean(by=['sf_metric']).publish(label='B')
C = data('Disk Write Bytes', filter=filter('primary_aggregation_type', 'true'), extrapolation='last_value', maxExtrapolations=5).mean(by=['sf_metric']).publish(label='C')
D = data('Disk Read Bytes', filter=filter('primary_aggregation_type', 'true'), extrapolation='last_value', maxExtrapolations=5).mean(by=['sf_metric']).publish(label='D')

chart.name: Network Bytes Out vs 24hr Change %
chart.programText:
A = data('Network Out', filter=filter('resource_type', 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines') and filter('primary_aggregation_type', 'true'), rollup='average').mean(by=['azure_resource_id', 'azure_resource_name']).publish(label='A')
B = (A).mean().publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = (B).timeshift('1d').publish(label='C', enable=False)
D = (B/C-1).scale(100).publish(label='D')

chart.name: Network Bytes Out vs. 24h Change %
chart.programText:
A = data('Network Out', filter=filter('resource_type', 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachineScaleSets') and filter('primary_aggregation_type', 'true'), extrapolation='last_value', maxExtrapolations=5).sum().publish(label='A')
B = (A).mean().publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = (B).timeshift('1d').publish(label='C', enable=False)
D = (B/C - 1).scale(100).publish(label='D')

chart.name: Disk I/O Bytes/Min
chart.programText:
A = data('Disk Read Bytes', filter=filter('resource_type', 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachineScaleSets') and filter('primary_aggregation_type', 'true'), extrapolation='last_value', maxExtrapolations=5).sum().scale(60).publish(label='A')
B = data('Disk Write Bytes', filter=filter('resource_type', 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachineScaleSets') and filter('primary_aggregation_type', 'true'), extrapolation='last_value', maxExtrapolations=5).sum().scale(60).publish(label='B')

chart.name: Top Scale Sets by Bytes Out
chart.programText: A = data('Network Out', filter=filter('resource_type', 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachineScaleSets') and filter('primary_aggregation_type', 'true'), extrapolation='last_value', maxExtrapolations=5).mean(by=['azure_resource_id', 'azure_resource_name']).top(count=5).publish(label='A')

chart.name: Disk I/O
chart.programText:
A = data('Disk Read Bytes', filter=filter('aggregation_type', 'total'), extrapolation='last_value', maxExtrapolations=5).publish(label='A')
B = data('Disk Write Bytes', filter=filter('aggregation_type', 'total'), extrapolation='last_value', maxExtrapolations=5).publish(label='B')

dashboard.description: An overview of multiple Microsoft Azure Virtual Machine Scale Sets
dashboard.name: Azure VM Scale Sets

dashboard.description: Charts to monitor an individual Azure VM Scale Set
dashboard.name: Azure VM Scale Set

group.description: Dashboards for Azure VM Scale Sets
group.name: Azure VM Scale Sets
